block.p: FRIEDMAN-Sara. The administration and medical staff at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center joins with the Department of Dentistry in acknowledging with sadness the passing of Sara Friedman, beloved wife of our retiring Chairman of Dentistry, Jerome Friedman, M.D. To the entire Friedman family, we extend our heartfelt condolences. Sigurd H. Ackerman, M.D. President & CEO Wendy Z. Goldstein Executive Vice President & COO Lawrence Huntington Chairman, Board of Trustees
